desc: I have searched far and wide for these instant heirlooms & I wanted to create a space with warmth & comfort that makes it easy for others to enjoy these beautiful pieces of art. Each piece selected by me is an authentic handwoven, wool, Turkish rug, including Oushak, Konya or Kilim & most have been previously loved.

layout.text: with a vintage, handmade Turkish rug. Instantly transform your space with a piece of history.
